item.title: About Me
item.description:
PROFILE

Name: Changrui CHEN (陈常瑞)
Institute Address: College of Information Science and Engineering, Ocean University of China, No. 238 Songling Road, Qingdao, 266100 P.R. China

E-Mail:

RESEARCH INTERESTS AND STATEMENTS

My research interests focus on object detection and segmentation in many application environments (e.g., drone-captured images, underwater images). I have developed two underwater robots to deploy and test our algorithms for the real-world application. Besides, I also interest in mining the relation in natural images to boost the deep learning segmentation algorithm under weakly supervised or unsupervised condition.

EDUCATION

  • Bachelor Ocean University of China, Computer Science and Technology, 2013-2017, GPA: 3.4 (out of 4)

  • Master Ocean University of China, Vision Lab, Computer Technology, 2017-now, Supervisor: Prof. Xin Sun, GPA: 3.63 (out of 4) Rank No.1

HONORS AND AWARDS

  • 2019 IEEE International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV) Vision Meets Drones Challenge

    • Object Detection in Images: Runner-up (Role: Leader)

  • 2017 Underwater Robot Piking Contest (Organized by National Natural Science Foundation of China)

    • Object Detection(online): First Award

  • 2018 Underwater Robot Piking Contest

    • Object Detection(offline): Second Award
    • Object Picking: Third Award

  • 2017 China Computer Federation Ship Detection in the Complex Ocean Environment

    • First place in the preliminary round，Top 5% in the final round

  • Ocean University of China Outstanding Graduate Student

  • China National Scholarship (2019)

  • Ocean University of China Scholarship, Grade One (2017)

  • Ocean University of China Scholarship, Grade Two (2016)

  • Ocean University of China Scholarship, Grade Two (2015)

  • Ocean University of China Scholarship, Grade Two (2014)

RESEARCH PROJECTS

[1] Graduate Student Foundation of Ocean University of China: Object Detection in Complex Underwater Environment, March 2018 - March 2019 (Leader)
[2] Student Research Development Project of Ocean University of China: A Medical Assistance Application based on Miband, 2016 (Leader)

PAPERS

[1] RRNet: A Hybrid Detector for Object Detection in Drone-captured Images, first author, accepted by IEEE International Conference on Computer Vision Workshop (ICCVW 2019). [2] Learning Deep Relations to Promote Saliency Detection, first author, submitted to Thirty- Fourth AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI 2020). [3] Exploring Ubiquitous Relations for Boosting Classification and Localizations, first author, submitted to Neurocomputing (in revision). [4] Highlight Every Step: Knowledge Distillation via Collaborative Teaching, co-author, submitted to IEEE Transaction on Cybernetics. [5] Few-shot Learning for Domain-specific Fine-grained Image Classification, co-author, submitted to IEEE Transactions on Industrial Electronics.

OTHER PROJECTS

[1] I developed a semantic segmentation and object detection framework which includes many famous segmentation and detection models (PSPNet, FCNs, Deeplab, RetinaNet, and FasterRCNN, etc.). [2] Deploying and maintaining the computing clusters (based on Hadoop, Docker, and Open PAI), code repository, website and blog of my group.
[3] Contributors of the Open Platform for AI (developed by Microsoft)
